name: Out of Flight
description:
A little bird is learning how to control his flight in a sunken world.

Submission for the gmtk 48 hour gamejam 2020, with the theme "Out of Control". Everything except the music and sounds have been made during the jam. The game was made with monogame 3.7.1. 

Openly used sound and music Assets:

  • Song by Chad Crouch
  • Powerup sound effect by djlprojects
  • Zoom-out sound effect by CosmicEmbers
  • Wind sound effect by Mark DiAngelo
  • Respawn sound effect by sergenious
